caption: Figure 1: Dataset Curation Pipeline
description: The figure illustrates the two-stage process used to create the CCI3.0-HQ dataset.  It starts with Raw Data, which undergoes Fundamental Processing to produce the CCI3.0 dataset.  This dataset is then further refined through High-Quality Processing, resulting in the final CCI3.0-HQ dataset.  The figure visually represents this flow with boxes and diamonds, depicting the steps of processing and showing decision points indicated by "Yes" arrows.
